doc.title: Hard Whips for Soft Bodies
doc.plot: Mistress Alexis Payne brings back a runaway slave for a painful reminder of what lies ahead for the rebellious. Another slave attempts to rescue her - and the Mistress' fury is something to behold! Her trembling slaves are led into the Dungeon of Remorse, where they are subjected to whips, clips, bastinado, and other severe punishments! A wealthy wanna-be is allowed to watch, and be put to the test to see if she is worthy to be the Mistress' new slave. How she and her chauffeur attempt to deceive the Mistress, and what the Mistress does when she discovers their treachery, form the climax of this vivid depiction of torment and retribution!
